1.content:
Okay, let's get this started. First of all, I want to not that if you choose Shinku or a Harem option that includes Shinku, then you replace Jun Sakurada.

Now, choose your girl.
1.title: The Beggining.

11.content:
Harem. Okay.

Here are the girls I klnow.

I'll leave a space at the bottom, in case I have forgotten one or more.
11.title: Harem.

112.content: Oh? Light and darkness, huh? Well then, choose your powers!
112.title: Shinku+Suigintou.

113.content: The three dark girls, hm? Well, Suiseiseki isn't a bad girl. But she sure can be wicked some times, right? Anyway, choose your powers.
113.title: Suigintou+Suiseiseki+Barasuishou.

114.content: One light+two darkness+A human=? Let's find out, shall we? Select your powers.
114.title: Barasuishou+Suigintou+Shinku.

14.content: Which one of the sisters?
14.title: Suiseiseki/Souseiseki.

143.content: Which powers do you want?
143.title: Both sisters.

15.content: We have bad girls too! Suigintou, Barasuishou and Kirakishou. Which one(s) do you want?
15.title: Bad Girls

151.content: Which ones do you want Wacko?
151.title: Two of them!

153.content: Which powers do you want?
153.title: Barasuishou.

info.brief_description: One or many of the female characters from the Anime "Rozen Maiden" fall in love with you.
info.description:
That's right folks. Another "girlfriend" Interactive Story.

IMPORTANT!!! I know the characters in the Anime are dolls. So, for the story's sake, when the storyline's main character and one or more of the doll are going to have sex, they MUST change into humans until the sex is over. How they change is up to you.

Now, instead of stalling, I'll go straight to the rules:

1-There MUST be a chaos option;

2-In the chaos option, the character's name MUST be Leon Miyanoshita Seiryu. To know who and how Leon is, send me an e-mail, on this site, and I'll tell you.

3-In the "normal" branch, do whatever you want. Just make sure you use proper grammar, make a good story and no one line chapters, except for choices;

4-I'll allow sex, just don't go overboard (example: don't write about sex every two or five chapters), some yuri (in the Harem choices only), threesomes (only in the Harem choices and with the main character and two of the girls) and foursomes (sex with four persons . Only in the harem choices).

4.1 (NEW): Allowed kinds of sex: Normal (Vaginal), Tit Fuck, Blowjob, Anal Sex and 69.

5-Please write a warning chapter when you're going to write about anything that is sex related and say what it contains. Example: Say if the chapter will contain threesomes, yuri, normal sex, etc...

6-Don't kill the main character or any supporting character, except the ones that die in the Anime. Like the villainess from season 1, Suigintou. However, I remmind you that, even if some character dies in the Anime, it's NOT obligatory to kill him/her in this story.

7: NO adding chapters "just to fill in" or "just for the sake of it"! If you can't think of a good chapter, then don't write!

8-I have nothing against the Naruto characters. But I don't want them in my story. The only exception is Orochimaru as the BAD guy. No one else from Naruto allowed. If you want to add a character from another Anime/Manga, then ask me by e-mail FIRST.

Also, here goes a piece of advice: If you have an idea or a few ideas but have little or no confidence in yourself or in your writing skills, then send ME the idea and I'll analyze the idea and then I'll add it or shape it to fit the with the story.

NO FETISHES ALLOWED!!!

Gift Points for those who write GOOD chapters! 300 GP!!!

-Keep the story in second person point of view (POV) (i.e. YOU started climbing her, or YOU went down her throat) (Must follow);
-Check the grammar, PLEASE!!! (MUST follow):
-If you are going to add to this story, make it so that the people are able to read and understand the chapter (no writing like this: "U R n00b!") (MUST follow);
